column5: Happy holidays!!!  in the last couple of posts i've read i've been told that some outfitters are putting out their huts... but this was b4 the "THAW" thats happened this week. Does anyone know what callander bay is like right now? we are going up on Jan 8... i'm a liitle nervous that we might need our canoe  if you know of any website that has up to date ice conditions for callander bay, please let us know,  that would be greatly appreciated   desperately seeking hard water
thanks alot!!! we may come by and check out your huts once we're up there   phil
That wasnt my site i just got that off the internet for you.Just trying to help a fellow fisherman out.
